issue.title: [Python] Add a function telling whether Parquet encryption is available
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15825](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15825). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to have a function, e.g. `pyarrow.parquet.is_encryption_available()`, to be able to query whether Parquet encryption is available in the PyArrow build.

(currently, one would have to import the relevant module and catch the ImportError)
